languages.text: "Возможно, я воспользовалась определенными привилегиями, даруемыми мне статусом фаворитки Вольного Торговца. Невозможно подержать мед во рту и не попробовать".
"It's possible I availed myself of certain privileges granted by my status as a favourite of the Rogue Trader. It is impossible to hold a spoonful of honey in one's mouth and not taste it."
languages.original_text: "Возможно, я воспользовалась определенными привилегиями, даруемыми мне статусом фаворитки Вольного Торговца. Невозможно подержать мед во рту и не попробовать".

traits.locale_text: "It's possible I availed myself of certain privileges granted by my status as a favourite of the Rogue Trader. It is impossible to hold a spoonful of honey in one's mouth and not taste it."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “或许我确实利用了行商浪人宠爱之人的特权，这确实有可能。把整勺蜂蜜含在嘴里，必定会尝到甜蜜的味道。”
languages.original_text: "It's possible I availed myself of certain privileges granted by my status as a favourite of the Rogue Trader. It is impossible to hold a spoonful of honey in one's mouth and not taste it."

traits.locale_text: “或许我确实利用了行商浪人宠爱之人的特权，这确实有可能。把整勺蜂蜜含在嘴里，必定会尝到甜蜜的味道。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「あたしは、自由開拓者に気に入られたことで手に入れた特権を利用したのかもしれないね。スプーンいっぱいのはちみつを口に含んで、その味を感じないなんてことはありえないもの」
languages.original_text: "It's possible I availed myself of certain privileges granted by my status as a favourite of the Rogue Trader. It is impossible to hold a spoonful of honey in one's mouth and not taste it."

traits.locale_text: 「あたしは、自由開拓者に気に入られたことで手に入れた特権を利用したのかもしれないね。スプーンいっぱいのはちみつを口に含んで、その味を感じないなんてことはありえないもの」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Cabe la posibilidad de que haya sacado provecho de ciertos privilegios que me otorga mi estatus como favorita del Comerciante Independiente. Es imposible tener un cucharón de miel en la boca y no degustarla».
languages.original_text: "It's possible I availed myself of certain privileges granted by my status as a favourite of the Rogue Trader. It is impossible to hold a spoonful of honey in one's mouth and not taste it."

traits.locale_text: «Cabe la posibilidad de que haya sacado provecho de ciertos privilegios que me otorga mi estatus como favorita del Comerciante Independiente. Es imposible tener un cucharón de miel en la boca y no degustarla».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Il est possible que je me sois octroyé certains privilèges, de par mon statut de favorite {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Vous vous attendiez vraiment à ce que je tienne une cuillère de miel entre mes dents sans y goûter ? »
languages.original_text: "It's possible I availed myself of certain privileges granted by my status as a favourite of the Rogue Trader. It is impossible to hold a spoonful of honey in one's mouth and not taste it."

traits.locale_text: « Il est possible que je me sois octroyé certains privilèges, de par mon statut de favorite {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Vous vous attendiez vraiment à ce que je tienne une cuillère de miel entre mes dents sans y goûter ? »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Es ist durchaus möglich, dass ich mir gewisse Privilegien gegönnt habe, da ich doch so hoch in der Gunst {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} stehe. Es war mir unmöglich, am süßen Nektar der Versuchung zu nippen und ihn dann nicht ganz aufzuessen."
languages.original_text: "It's possible I availed myself of certain privileges granted by my status as a favourite of the Rogue Trader. It is impossible to hold a spoonful of honey in one's mouth and not taste it."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist durchaus möglich, dass ich mir gewisse Privilegien gegönnt habe, da ich doch so hoch in der Gunst {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} stehe. Es war mir unmöglich, am süßen Nektar der Versuchung zu nippen und ihn dann nicht ganz aufzuessen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Hür Tacir'in gözdelerinden olma pozisyonumun bana sağladığı bazı imtiyazlardan faydalanmış olmam mümkün. İnsanın ağzına bir kaşık bal sokması ama tadına bakmaması imkânsızdır sonuçta."
languages.original_text: "It's possible I availed myself of certain privileges granted by my status as a favourite of the Rogue Trader. It is impossible to hold a spoonful of honey in one's mouth and not taste it."

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
